blanket.module.documentation: List of modules composing the blanket

blanket.module[:].layer.documentation: List of layers in the blanket module

blanket.module[:].layer[:].material.documentation: List of materials that comprise the layer

blanket.module[:].layer[:].material[:].c.documentation: Fraction of layer comprised of the specified material

blanket.module[:].layer[:].midplane_thic.documentation: Thickness of layer evaluated at the midplane

blanket.module[:].time_slice.documentation: Blanket module info at various time slices

blanket.module[:].time_slice[:].peak_esc.documentation: Maximum neutron flux escaping from the back of the blanket module

blanket.module[:].time_slice[:].peak_wal.documentation: Maximum neutron flux at the first wall

blanket.module[:].time_slice[:].power_in.documentation: Total incident neutron power on the blanket module
Total incident radiative power on the blanket module

blanket.module[:].time_slice[:].power_th.documentation: Total thermal power that is extracted from the blanket module
Total neutron power (deposited + generated) in the blanket module
Total radiated power (incident - reflected) in the blanket module

blanket.module[:].time_slice[:].tritium_.documentation: Number of tritium atoms for each incident neutron (TBR)

blanket.tritium_breeding_ratio.documentation: Number of tritium atoms created for each fusion neutron (TBR)
